name: The Great Jelltastic Escape
description:
The Great Jelltastic Escape is a physics-based adventure puzzle game starring Jiggle the Jelly, who wants to venture off into the outside world & meet its jelly friends. Jiggle, bounce and shoot your way through obstacles & squeeze your way to freedom.

Credits:

  • Melinda Sultana: Environment Artist & Project Manager
  • Angelo Estoque: Lead Programmer
  • Jonathan Dowse: Programmer & Sound Designer
  • Cathy Kha: Lead Artist & Concept Artist
  • Jessica Larkin: Lead Artist & Concept Artist
  • Clinton Hui: Artist & Project Manager
